structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: Duty of sheriff to attend clerk's office.
law.text: It shall be the duty of the sheriff, or of one (1) of his deputies, to attend at the clerk's office daily -- Sundays excepted -- to receive any process that may be issued, and the clerk shall deliver to him any process remaining in his office.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 46.
